Inside the Citadel.LONGDESC: You find yourself suddenly within the citadel, not remembering entering or having to approach any set of doors--yet a large pair of doors is open to the south. The interior itself is quite featureless, tall stone walls surround you in a circular room. There is one small set of doors to the east.
Inside the Citadel.SHORTDESC: The plain hall is before you, to the south is the path, to the east doors.
